title: Integrating Nomic Atlas with Machine Learning Pipelines | Nomic Atlas Documentation

overview.description: This guide explains how to seamlessly integrate Nomic Atlas into machine learning workflows to enhance data analysis, model training, and evaluation.
overview.purpose: To provide step-by-step instructions for embedding Nomic Atlas within ML pipelines for better insights and decision-making.

step_1.title: Prepare Your Dataset
details: Ensure your dataset is cleaned, structured, and annotated appropriately.
Include metadata such as labels, timestamps, or categories for enhanced analysis.

step_2.title: Generate Embeddings
details: Use pre-trained models or train custom models to generate embeddings.
Ensure embeddings capture the semantic relationships in your data.

example_code.code:
from nomic import AtlasDataset

data = [{'text': 'Example text', 'metadata': {'category': 'A'}},
        {'text': 'Another example', 'metadata': {'category': 'B'}}]

dataset = AtlasDataset(name='My Dataset')
dataset.add_data(data)
dataset.generate_embeddings(model='text_model')

step_3.title: Upload to Nomic Atlas
details: Create a new project on Nomic Atlas.
Upload the embeddings and metadata for visualization and exploration.

step_4.title: Visualize and Explore
details: Use Nomic Atlas's interactive tools to explore embeddings.
Apply filters, search, and clustering tools to analyze patterns and relationships.

step_5.title: Integrate Insights into ML Workflow
details: Use insights from visualization to refine data preprocessing, feature engineering, or model architecture.
Identify and address issues such as class imbalances, outliers, or poorly separated clusters.

best_practices.data_preparation: Ensure high-quality data preprocessing to improve embedding effectiveness.
best_practices.metadata_inclusion: Incorporate meaningful metadata for better contextual analysis.
best_practices.iterative_analysis: Regularly visualize and analyze embeddings throughout the ML pipeline to refine models and datasets.

use_cases.data_quality_assessment: Visualize embeddings to evaluate dataset quality and identify anomalies or inconsistencies.
use_cases.model_training: Use embedding insights to optimize feature selection, hyperparameters, and training strategies.
use_cases.performance evaluation: Analyze embeddings to assess model outputs and identify areas for improvement.

conclusion.summary: Integrating Nomic Atlas into machine learning pipelines enhances data understanding, model optimization, and performance evaluation.
actionable_next_steps: Generate embeddings and upload them to Nomic Atlas.
Leverage visualization insights to refine and optimize your ML workflow.
